name: Vssthrii
description:
Steppe Predators
The Vssthrii are a lizardfolk culture of hunters who roam the steppes in grand migrations. They value keen senses, cooking skills, and honor their greatest hunters as scouts.

options.name: Savage Fighting
options.description: When you miss with a Melee Attack, you make a quick and brutal Unarmed Attack against the same Target with a 1d4 Attack Penalty but an additional 2d6 damage.

options.name: Hunter's Persuasion
options.description: Gain +1 Persuasion and you can use hunting trophies to establish respect with warrior cultures.

options.name: Steppe Survivor
options.description: Gain +1 Cooking and food you prepare grants resistance to extreme temperatures for 24 hours.
